definition: absentminded dreaming while awake, have a daydream
details:
noun
- absentminded dreaming while awake
= example: absentminded dreaming while awake
= synonyms: reverie
verb
- have a daydream
= example: have a daydream
= synonyms: dream
- have dreamlike musings or fantasies while awake
= example: have dreamlike musings or fantasies while awake
= synonyms: moon
